about_the_game:
Wishlist EXTERMINATION SHIP to get news about the game.





Your task is simple — survive aboard a massive vessel navigating the open waters. But each day brings new challenges, and gradually you begin to realize that the familiar routine is becoming a dangerous trap. Disappearing crew members, strange noises in the corridors, and a foggy unknown shrouding the ship from the outside world—all make you question what's real and what's a figment of your imagination.



Every day you perform your duties, but with each step, there is a growing sense that something sinister is lurking behind the ship's walls. Impenetrable fog beyond the deck and the vanishing faces of the crew make you wonder: are you truly alone on this ship? Walk through the empty corridors and discover what really happened to your colleagues.



Keep your sanity intact by handling daily tasks and trying not to succumb to your fears. But remember: something waits in the shadows, ready to reveal its intentions when you least expect it. Are you prepared to face what this ship hides? Are you ready to endure 14 days that will change your perception of reality?

name: EXTERMINATION SHIP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11320H or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe Graphics or AMD equivalent with 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570 with 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: N/A

short_description: Try to survive on a deserted ship drifting in a foggy ocean. Complete daily tasks, keep your sanity, and uncover the secrets of the missing crew. But be careful—nothing is as simple as it seems. Are you ready for the challenge?
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Swedish, Turkish
